org.apache.james.protocols.pop3

Class POP3StreamResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.james.protocols.api.AbstractResponse
      • org.apache.james.protocols.pop3.POP3Response

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Response, StreamResponse

    public class POP3StreamResponse
extends POP3Response
implements StreamResponse
    StreamResponse implementation which allows to write back big-data to the client for POP3

    • Method Detail

      • getStream

        public InputStream getStream()
        Description copied from interface: StreamResponse
        Return the stream which needs to get written to the remote peer. This method should only be called one time (when the data is written to the client) as it returns the same InputStream on every call. So once it is consumed there is no way to re-process it.
        Specified by:
        getStream in interface StreamResponse
        Returns:
        stream

      • immutable

        public Response immutable()
        Throws UnsupportedOperationException
        Overrides:
        immutable in class AbstractResponse
        Returns:
        immutable
